text: The 2011 Colorado State Rams football team represented Colorado State University in the 2011 NCAA Division I FBS football season. The Rams were led by fourth year head coach Steve Fairchild and played their home games at Sonny Lubick Field at Hughes Stadium. They are members of the Mountain West Conference. They finished the season 3–9, 1–6 in Mouintain West play to finish in a three way tie for sixth place. Head coach Steve Fairchild was fired at end of the season after four year record of 16–33. ==Schedule== http://www.csurams.com/sports/m-footbl/sched/csu-m-footbl-sched.html ==References== Colorado State Category:Colorado State Rams football seasons Colorado State Football
title: 2011 Colorado State Rams football team
